item1.name: Mercury's Treads
item1.description:
25 Magic Resist
45 Move Speed
30% Tenacity

Tenacity reduces the duration of Stun, Slow, Taunt, Fear, Silence, Blind, Polymorph and Immobilizing effects. It has no effect on Airborne or Suppression.

item2.name: Bulwark of the Mountain
item2.description:
20 Ability Power
250 Health
100% Base Health Regen
3 Gold Per 10 Seconds

Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 0 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.

This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

item5.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
item5.description:
200 Health
20 Ability Haste
30 Armor
30 Magic Resist

Active - Devotion: Grant nearby allies a 230 - 385 (based on ally level) Shield, decaying over 2.5 seconds (90s cooldown).
  • Consecrate: Grant nearby allied champions 5 Armor and Magic Resist.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 2 Armor/ Magic Resist increase to Consecrate.

    Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Guardian
perk0.shortDesc: Guard allies you cast spells on and those that are very nearby. If you or a guarded ally would take damage based on level, you're both granted a shield.
perk0.longDesc:
Guard allies within 350 units of you, and allies you target with spells for 2.5s. While Guarding, if you or the ally take more than a small amount of damage over the duration of the Guard, both of you gain a shield for 1.5s.

Cooldown: 70 - 40 seconds
Shield: 70 - 150 + 15% of your ability power + 9% of your bonus health
Proc Threshold: 90 - 250 postmitigation damage

item0.name: Staff of Flowing Water
item0.description:
50 Ability Power
10% Heal and Shield Power
100% Base Mana Regen
  • Rapids: Healing or Shielding an ally grants you both 15% Move Speed and 20 - 40 (ally ) Ability Power for 3 seconds.

    Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

item1.name: Mercury's Treads
item1.description:
25 Magic Resist
45 Move Speed
30% Tenacity

Tenacity reduces the duration of Stun, Slow, Taunt, Fear, Silence, Blind, Polymorph and Immobilizing effects. It has no effect on Airborne or Suppression.

item2.name: Bulwark of the Mountain
item2.description:
20 Ability Power
250 Health
100% Base Health Regen
3 Gold Per 10 Seconds

Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 0 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.

This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

item5.name: Shurelya's Battlesong
item5.description:
40 Ability Power
200 Health
20 Ability Haste
100% Base Mana Regen

Active - Inspire: Grants you and nearby allies 60% decaying Move Speed for 4 seconds. Champions gain an additional 35 - 55 (based on ally level) magic damage on the next 3 Attacks or Ability hits against champions (75s cooldown).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 2.5% Move Speed.

Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Guardian

perk0.longDesc:
Guard allies within 350 units of you, and allies you target with spells for 2.5s. While Guarding, if you or the ally take more than a small amount of damage over the duration of the Guard, both of you gain a shield for 1.5s.

Cooldown: 70 - 40 seconds
Shield: 70 - 150 + 15% of your ability power + 9% of your bonus health
Proc Threshold: 90 - 250 postmitigation damage

item0.name: Targon's Buckler
item0.description:
10 Ability Power
100 Health
50% Base Health Regen
3 Gold Per 10 Seconds

Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 0 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.
  • Spoils of War: While nearby an allied champion, Attacks execute minions below 0% of their max Health. Killing a minion grants the same kill gold to the nearest allied champion. These effects recharge every 0 seconds (Max 0 charges).
  • Quest: Earn 1000 gold from this item to transform it into Bulwark of the Mountain.

    This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

item1.name: Plated Steelcaps
item1.description:
20 Armor
45 Move Speed
  • Reduces incoming damage from Attacks by 12%.

item1.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item1.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item2.name: Zeke's Convergence
item2.description:
250 Health
25 Armor
250 Mana
20 Ability Haste

Active - Conduit: Designate an Accomplice (60s cooldown).
  • Convergence: For 8 seconds after you Immobilize an enemy, your Accomplice's Attacks ( On-Hit) and Ability hits apply an additional (30 - 70 (based on level) + 1.5% Health + 7.5% Ability Power) magic damage to that enemy.

    Champions can only be linked by one Zeke's Convergence at a time.

item3.name: Control Ward
item3.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item5.name: Shurelya's Battlesong
item5.description:
40 Ability Power
200 Health
20 Ability Haste
100% Base Mana Regen

Active - Inspire: Grants you and nearby allies 60% decaying Move Speed for 4 seconds. Champions gain an additional 35 - 55 (based on ally level) magic damage on the next 3 Attacks or Ability hits against champions (75s cooldown).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 2.5% Move Speed.

Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.
